resources.string: Najskôr udeľte oprávnenia prístupu k úložisku.

By default, requests are only stored internally in Blokada. If this feature is enabled, Blokada will create a CSV file and log requests that have been allowed and / or blocked by the app. Look for \"blokada\" folder on your external storage. Alternatively, request logging can be disabled entirely, with just the number of blocked domains being stored.
